summary: Two couple of friends, one very rich the other almost homeless, decides to go on Holiday. Julie, a single mother, joins them too. Once at seaside, it starts a complicate love cross among ... See full summary »
cast: Charlotte Rampling|Jacques Dutronc|Carole Bouquet|Michel Blanc|Karin Viard|Denis Podalydès|Clotilde Courau|Vincent Elbaz|Lou Doillon|Sami Bouajila|Gaspard Ulliel|Mélanie Laurent|Matthieu Boujenah|Mickaël Dolmen|Barbara Kelsch|Nicolas Briançon|Jade Phan-Gia|Serge Brincat|Hélène Pecqueur|Dominic Gould|Benoît Solès|Tugdual Rio|Arnaud Le Bozec|Jean-François Demay|Valérie Clairet|Solène de la Villesbret|Delphine Sérina|Gérard Renault|Stéphane Bouby|Nathalie Grandhomme|Ed Stoppard|Park Bench|Stephen Croce|Anna Murie|Zoé Murie|Alexandra Charles|Sylvie Normandeau|Craig Snoyer
title: Besen a quien quieran
